name: Anastasia
overview: A princess of the Russian royal family, Anastasia's life is changed forever when the traitor, Rasputin, takes her father's throne. Her memory lost, Anastasia must flee the palace with Alexander, ayoung soldier. As well as a great half-hour cartoon video, Anastasia features an easy-to-use virtual colouring book and achallenging puzzle game. Can the princess escape?
